name: Scary Goat 2017
description:
Your favorite goat game is back with a wicked twist! Scary Goat is on the loose and ready to create chaos in the Big Apple!

Scamper and jump around New York City. Scary Goat is on a mission to cause destruction...and maybe catch some tasty snack if he’s lucky!. Run in a rampage and scare everyone away! Kick down gates and cars with your powerful hooves. Race and chase down bicycles and scare them for life with your crazy goat eyes! Take control of trucks and cars when you steal them, and drive them like a human! Fight and attack city heroes.

Finally, take the ultimate thrilling adventure and fly your goat on a rocket above the city. Hit buildings, skyscrapers, bridges, planes, and helicopters from above! In the atmosphere, get a spectacular aerial view. Each different activity or mission will own you points. Exercise to increase your stamina and health for ultimate attack. Stick your tongue to a car is pull it away or may be fly to a building roof.


Scary Goat 2017 Features:

•Amazing Goat Textures to choose from
•Flying Goat packed with Rockets for ultimate destruction
•Drive Tractor, Cars and heavy vehicles for ultimate destruction
•Play multiple sports games e.g Volleyball & football as Scary Goat
•Fun sounds and visual effects for maximum thrill
•Amazing scary goat attack animations
•Smooth and easy controls to make the Goat run and attack
•Realistic 3D Graphics, including a beautiful 3D city environment
